definition: children take the roles of physician or patient or nurse and pretend they are at the physician's office, give medical treatment to
details:
noun
- children take the roles of physician or patient or nurse and pretend they are at the physician's office
= example: children take the roles of physician or patient or nurse and pretend they are at the physician's office
- a licensed medical practitioner
= example: a licensed medical practitioner
= synonyms: MD
- a person who holds Ph.D. degree or the equivalent from an academic institution
= example: a person who holds Ph.D. degree or the equivalent from an academic institution
verb
- give medical treatment to
- restore by replacing a part or putting together what is torn or broken
= synonyms: fix
- alter and make impure, as with the intention to deceive
= synonyms: sophisticate, doctor up
